steps.content: PMO can stand for â€œPut Me On.â€ â€œPut Me Onâ€ is a casual phrase for introducing a person to someone (or something). [1] X Research source It carries the same meaning on other social media platforms as well, like TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter. PMO can be spelled in all capital letters or in all lowercase letters. Either way, it means the same thing! â€œI love that band!! Sam pmo them ğŸ¶â€ â€œDo you think you could PMO with Ashley? ğŸ‘€â€

steps.content: PMO can also be short for â€œPiss Me Off.â€ If someoneâ€™s really angry about something, they might drop PMO in a text or social media post as shorthand for â€œPiss Me Offâ€ or â€œPisses Me Off.â€ [2] X Research source PMO can also stand for â€œPiss Me Offâ€ on other social media platforms, from TikTok and Twitter to Instagram and Facebook. â€œPMO when people pronounce my last name incorrectly ğŸ™„â€ â€œPeople who donâ€™t use their turn signals until the last second pmo ğŸ˜¡â€

steps.content: PMO can also mean â€œPut Me Onâ€ or â€œPiss Me Offâ€ in a text message. PMO generally has the same 2 meanings on both social media and textâ€”you just need to look at the context of your convo to see what the other person is trying to say. steps.content: Send PMO to request an introduction with someone. Trying to score a date with someone? PMO is a great way to describe your romantic interest in someone. Ask a mutual friend if theyâ€™re willing to pull some strings, and see what they say. â€œDo you think you could pmo with Dan sometime? Ik you both work at the same coffee shop ğŸ˜…â€ â€œThis is gonna sound super weird, but could you PMO with your cousin? Sheâ€™s super cute ğŸ˜â€

steps.content: Ask someone to add you on social media with PMO. Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok are all great ways to stay connected with your friendsâ€”but they have to follow and add you on those platforms first! steps.content: Share how irritated you are with a well-placed PMO. Maybe someone cut you off in traffic, or a customer gave you an earful at work. PMO is the perfect way to share just how irritated and frustrated you are in a quick, easy way. [4] X Research source â€œPMO when I get blamed for things that arenâ€™t my fault. ğŸ˜ â€ â€œIt pmo when people donâ€™t clean up after their pets ğŸ˜¡ğŸ’©â€

steps.title: Hook your friend up romantically with another person if you feel so inclined.
steps.content: Hook your friend up romantically with another person if you feel so inclined. Being asked to be a middle person in a potentially romantic introduction can be a little awkward, so donâ€™t feel obligated to lend a hand if you donâ€™t want to! I know sheâ€™s your neighbor ğŸ‘€â€ You: â€œSorry, but I really donâ€™t know her that well.â€ Them: â€œCould you do me a solid and PMO with Mike? I really like him ğŸ¥ºâ€ You: â€œSure! steps.content: Accept or decline someoneâ€™s invite to connect on social media. Feel free to accept the personâ€™s social media request if youâ€™re comfortable with them! Them: â€œYo PMO your Instagramâ€ You: â€œSorry, but I donâ€™t really know you that well ğŸ˜…â€ Them: â€œAyy wanna pmo your TikTok?â€ You: â€œSure thing! Hereâ€™s my profile ğŸ’›â€

steps.content: Offer some sympathy to a pissed-off friend. Let your friend know that their feelings are valid, and that you totally understand where theyâ€™re coming from. steps.title: PMO sometimes stands for â€œPorn, Masturbation, and Orgasm.â€
steps.content: PMO sometimes stands for â€œPorn, Masturbation, and Orgasm.â€ In adult communities, PMO is a casual way to describe the process of â€œgetting off.â€ You might see abbreviation â€œMOâ€ thrown around in these conversations, which simply stands for â€œMasturbation, Orgasm.â€ [5] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source In some circles, â€œPMOâ€ can also stand for â€œPre-Marital Orgasm.â€

steps.title: PMO can also be short for â€œProject Management Office.â€
steps.content: PMO can also be short for â€œProject Management Office.â€ In a workplace setting, a PMO group helps keep workplace projects organized, efficient, and of high quality. PMOs can be an internal part of a company/organization, or they can be external/not directly affiliated. [6] X Research source

steps.title: PMTFO is short for â€œPisses/Pissing Me The F*ck Off.â€
steps.content: PMTFO is short for â€œPisses/Pissing Me The F*ck Off.â€ A slightly more explicit version of the traditional PMO, PMTFO lets people know that youâ€™re really, really irritated about something. [7] X Research source â€œMy boss constantly makes these snide remarks and it PMTFO ğŸ¤¬â€

steps.content: PMOYS stands for â€œPut Me On Your Snapchat.â€ This a really casual way of asking someone to add you on Snapchat. [8] X Research source Them: â€œYo, PMOYSâ€ You: â€œI donâ€™t have Snapchat, sorry!â€

steps.title: Stay on top of new texting slang with these common acronyms.
steps.content: Stay on top of new texting slang with these common acronyms. Learn these popular slang terms to stay in the know and keep your texts looking like English instead of gibberish: BSF : â€œBest sister friendâ€ or â€œbest sibling friendâ€ MMK : â€œMmkayâ€ (a combo of â€œmmâ€ and â€œokayâ€) HB : â€œHeartbroken,â€ â€œhomeboy,â€ or â€œhow â€˜bout?â€ DL : â€œDown lowâ€ ABS : â€œAbsolutelyâ€ WYLL : â€œWhat you look likeâ€ or â€œWhat do you look like?â€ HYB : â€œHow you been?â€ ISTG : â€œI swear to Godâ€
